Interface IBetfairClient

Namespace
BetfairDotNet.Interfaces
Assembly
BetfairDotNet.dll

The top level client containing the services for the different Betfair APIs.

public interface IBetfairClient

Properties

Account

Functionality for the Betfair Account API such as getting account details, funds, statements, etc.

AccountService Account { get; }

Property Value

AccountService

Betting

Functionality for the Betfair Betting API. Operations include listing markets, placing bets, cancelling bets, etc.

BettingService Betting { get; }

Property Value

BettingService

Heartbeat

Functionality for the Betfair Heartbeat API which can perform an action when connection to the Betfair API is lost.

HeartbeatService Heartbeat { get; }

Property Value

HeartbeatService

Login

Login functionality for interactive and non-interactive workflows.

LoginService Login { get; }

Property Value

LoginService

Navigation

Functionality for retrieving navigation data for applications.

NavigationService Navigation { get; }

Property Value

NavigationService

Streaming

Provides a fluent interface for subscribing to the Betfair Streaming API using a reactive approach. Includes built in error handling.

StreamingService Streaming { get; }

Property Value

StreamingService
